title: Inactivate warning always comes out
body:
Well, haven't play rank for almost a month during hard working days, now this warning just keep pumping up to tell me even I start to play 1-2 rank game every day in the past 4 days after the warning start to pop-up.

It happened to me before, even I promoted into plat 3 from plat 4 in the last day of that warning), and I just got dropped back into plat4 after that day because of INACTIVE.

Can someone tell me how to deal with that?????

replies.body: It looks like you are ranked Plat in both solo/duo and flex queues. If you are eligible for decay in both then you will get the inactivity warning until you play a game in both to refresh it.
